title: I struggle with not knowing what words to write and how to write my paragraphs. How can I change that? - Quora

response.answer_text: How much are you reading? Submerging yourself in words will help you to write them, and will make them more readily accessible in your mind. If you're writing a specific genre, start there. If you're struggling to write, don’t stop.
Just write anything as it comes to your mind. Don’t try to be perfect in the beginning, write anything. When you are done with writing, you can now edit. I hope that helps!
